item.title: How To Share YouTube Videos At A Specific Time
item.description: [caption id=“attachment_298” align=“alignright” width=“300”]Sharing a YouTube video at a specific time; although why you would want to skip any of this song is beyond me.[/caption] Okay, so this is nothing new but I still seem to sit through YouTube videos waiting for the one funny bit I’ve been told about. Imagine all the time that would be saved in the world if people would just right click on the YouTube video and select “Copy Video URL at current time”.
